short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a iCalendar (.ics) file format from NTU Stars Page that can be imported into Google Calendar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app is used to help Nanyang Technological University (NTU) students automatically generate a timetable for their course by using the details found on their STARS (Mod Registration) Portal.

It will parse the course information on the site after the student logins and download a .ics file. This file can then be imported into Google Calendar.

Update for v1.1:
Made parser ignore exempted modules
